title: Trump says Iran wants a deal more than the U.S. as American forces build up in oil-rich Middle East
summary_full: Iran wants to make a "deal" more than the U.S., President Donald Trump said Tuesday, ahead of a third round of bilateral talks in Switzerland later this week.
summary_public: Iran wants to make a "deal" more than the U.S., President Donald Trump said Tuesday, ahead of a third round of bilateral talks in Switzerland later this week.
